snippet: The Pebble smartwatch, a project on Kickstarter to build a wristwatch that can interact with a smartphone, has raised a significant amount of money through the crowdfunding platform after being turned down by venture capitalists.
abstract: The Pebble smartwatch, a project on Kickstarter to build a wristwatch that can interact with a smartphone, has raised a significant amount of money through the crowdfunding platform after being turned down by venture capitalists.

headline.main: Pebble Smartwatch Tops Out at $10 Million on Kickstarter
